japi.midnightconfig.title: JAPI Config
japi.midnightconfig.logDebug.tooltip: Enables extra logging for this mod and it's dependencies.
japi.midnightconfig.createModTabs.toolti: Adds new tabs to the creative inventory for each mod registering through this API.
power.japi.piglin_accepted.name: Piglin Accepted
power.japi.piglin_accepted.description: Piglins are neutral towards you as if you were wearing golden armor.
power.japi.zombie_ignored.name: Zombie Accepted
power.japi.zombie_ignored.description: Zombies see you as their own and will not target you unless provoked.
power.japi.all_ignored.name: Friend of All
power.japi.all_ignored.description: No enemies will attack you even if you attack them.
power.japi.enemy_of_all.name: Enemy of All
power.japi.enemy_of_all.description: All mobs are naturally aggressive towards you.
power.japi.require_correct_tools.name: Require Correct Tools
power.japi.require_correct_tools.descrip: Prevents the player from mining blocks unless they use the correct tool
power.japi.require_correct_tools_pickaxe: Prevents the player from mining blocks unless they use the correct tool
Prevents the player from mining blocks unless they use the correct tool
power.japi.require_correct_tools_axe.des: Prevents the player from mining blocks unless they use the correct tool
power.japi.require_correct_tools_hoe.des: Prevents the player from mining blocks unless they use the correct tool
Prevents the player from mining blocks unless they use the correct tool
